thread.title: Diego Costa agrees mammoth new Chelsea deal - report
thread.title_full: Diego Costa agrees mammoth new Chelsea deal - report

title: Diego Costa agrees mammoth new Chelsea deal - report
text:
Published 14th February 2017 
Costa, 28, was linked with a big-money move to China throughout the January transfer window. 
But the Brazil-born Spain international eventually stayed put and, according to The Sun , is now ready to sign a bumper new deal with the Blues. 
They claim Costa has agreed a five-year contract worth Â£220,000-a-week plus bonuses to stay at Stamford Bridge. Ultimate XI: Football stars who almost signed for Chelsea Tuesday, 31st January 2017 CHELSEA are no strangers to splashing cash for the world's biggest stars but there were some that got away. 1 / 13 Ultimate XI: Football stars who almost signed for Chelsea 
GETTY Chelsea star Diego Costa 
It will see the striker usurp Cesc Fabregas as Chelsea's highest earner. 
The news will come as a boost to Antonio Conte, whose side currently sit eight points clear of Manchester City at the top of the table. 
Costa has bagged 15 goals in 23 top flught appearances this season, although he hasn't found the back of the net since last month's win over Hull. Related articles
